TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class XPathNodeIterator : ICloneable, System.Collections.IEnumerable
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathNodeIterator extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ICloneable
Public MustInherit Class XPathNodeIterator Implements ICloneable, IEnumerable
public ref class XPathNodeIterator abstract : ICloneable, System::Collections::IEnumerable
type XPathNodeIterator = class interface ICloneable interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供所選取節點集的 Iterator。

span.span: Provides an iterator over a selected set of nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的物件類別並非位於選取的節點集的第一個節點。An object returned by the class is not positioned on the first node in a selected set of nodes. 呼叫方法類別必須進行定位在選取的節點集的第一個節點上的物件。A call to the method of the class must be made to position the object on the first node in the selected set of nodes. 當使用，如果您編輯目前的節點或任何其祖系時，會遺失您目前的位置。When using the , if you edit the current node or any of its ancestors, your current position is lost. 如果您想要編輯的節點數目，您已選取，建立陣列中，所有從節點複製到陣列中，然後逐一查看陣列，並修改節點。If you want to edit a number of nodes that you have selected, create a array, copy all of the nodes from the into the array, then iterate through the array and modify the nodes. 有兩種方式來逐一查看集合使用類別。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 其中一種方式是使用方法，然後呼叫若要取得目前執行個體，如下列範例所示：One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一種方式是使用`foreach`迴圈來呼叫方法，並使用傳回的介面列舉的節點，如下列範例所示：Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 您應該使用並，或使用。You should either use and or use . 結合這兩種方法可能會導致非預期的結果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 比方說，如果首先，呼叫方法，然後方法呼叫`foreach`迴圈，`foreach`迴圈將不會啟動列舉結果集合的開頭，而從後的位置方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法類別，以選取節點集使用類別。The following example uses the method of the class to select a node set using the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#39)] 該範例採用 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

block.para:
當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫下列成員：When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: -
-

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化狀態，在這種類型的衍生的類別建構函式會呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator Clone() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Clone () As XPathNodeIterator

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回這個 物件的複製。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this object.

returns.span: 這個 物件的新 物件複製。

span.span: A new object clone of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製物件是否位於相同的節點中之節點集，如果已對呼叫方法。The cloned object is positioned at the same node in the node set if calls have been made to the method. 複製物件不會影響後續變更物件。The cloned object is not affected by subsequent changes to this object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得選取節點集中最後一個節點的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the last node in the selected set of nodes.

value.span: 所選取節點集中最後一個節點的索引，如果沒有選取的節點，則為 0。

span.span: The index of the last node in the selected set of nodes, or 0 if there are no selected nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會影響的位置。The property does not affect the position of the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Current As XPathNavigator
public: abstract property System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ Current { System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得此 的 物件，該物件位於目前的內容節點上。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the object for this , positioned on the current context node.

value.span: 物件，位於所選取節點集的內容節點上。

span.span: An object positioned on the context node from which the node set was selected.

value.span: 您必須呼叫 方法，將 移至所選取節點集的第一個節點上。

span.span: The method must be called to move the to the first node in the selected set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用傳回的屬性物件來取得目前的節點上的資訊。You can use the properties of the returned object to obtain information on the current node. 不過，傳回物件不能修改。However, the returned object should not be modified. 傳回物件無法移離選取的節點集。The returned object cannot be moved away from the selected node set. 或者，您可以複製物件使用方法類別。Alternatively, you can clone the object using the method of the class. 複製物件可以接著移動離開選定的節點集。The cloned object can then be moved away from the selected node set. 此方法複製物件可能會將 XPath 查詢的效能影響。This method of cloning the object might affect the performance of the XPath query. 如果， ，並方法會產生任何所選取的節點屬性可能不會指向內容節點。If the , , and methods result in no nodes being selected, the property might not be pointing to the context node. 若要測試是否已選取節點，請使用屬性，如下列範例所示。To test whether nodes have been selected, use the property as shown in the following example. ## Examples 下列範例會取得撰寫 Herman Melville 所使用的所有書名的屬性物件並方法類別。The following example gets all book titles authored by Herman Melville using the property of the object and the method of the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#6)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CurrentPosition As Integer
public: abstract property int CurrentPosition { int get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得選取節點集中目前位置的索引。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the index of the current position in the selected set of nodes.
The index of the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以 1 起始的索引。The index is 1-based. 因此，第一個節點都有其索引為 1。Therefore, the first node has an index of 1. 索引為 0 表示沒有選取的節點。An index of 0 indicates there are no selected nodes. 這個屬性一律會傳回正數的整數。This property always returns a positive integer.

Public Overridable Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回 物件，逐一查看選取的節點集。

span.span: Returns an object to iterate through the selected node set.

returns.span: 物件，逐一查看選取的節點集。

span.span: An object to iterate through the selected node set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值位於目前的位置上物件。The enumerator is positioned on the current position of the object. 有兩種方式來逐一查看集合使用類別。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 其中一種方式是使用方法，然後呼叫若要取得目前執行個體，如下列範例所示：One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一種方式是使用`foreach`迴圈來呼叫方法，並使用傳回的介面列舉的節點，如下列範例所示：Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 您應該使用方法和，或使用方法。You should either use the method and or use the method. 結合這兩種方法可能會導致非預期的結果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 比方說，如果首先，呼叫方法，然後方法呼叫`foreach`迴圈，`foreach`迴圈將不會啟動列舉結果集合的開頭，而從後的位置方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function MoveNext () As Boolean

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會將 屬性傳回的 物件移至所選取節點集的下一個節點。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, moves the object returned by the property to the next node in the selected node set.

returns.span: 如果 物件移至下一個節點則為 ，如果沒有其他選取的節點，則為 。

span.span: if the object moved to the next node; if there are no more selected nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件定位於選取的節點設定只有在對的初始呼叫之後的第一個節點上方法。The object is positioned on the first node in the selected node set only after the initial call to the method. 節點集以文件順序建立。The node set is created in document order. 因此，呼叫方法會移至文件順序的下一個節點。Therefore, calling the method moves to the next node in document order. 有兩種方式來逐一查看集合使用類別。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 其中一種方式是使用方法，然後呼叫若要取得目前執行個體，如下列範例所示：One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一種方式是使用`foreach`迴圈來呼叫方法，並使用傳回的介面列舉的節點，如下列範例所示：Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 您應該使用方法和，或使用方法。You should either use the method and or use the method. 結合這兩種方法可能會導致非預期的結果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 比方說，如果首先，呼叫方法，然後方法呼叫`foreach`迴圈，`foreach`迴圈將不會啟動列舉結果集合的開頭，而從後的位置方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法類別，以選取節點集使用類別。The following example uses the method of the class to select a node set using the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#39)] 該範例採用 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

summary.span: 建立目前執行個體複本的新物件。

span.span: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.

returns.span: 這個執行個體複本的新物件。

span.span: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
